title: Dancing Lights
description: Creates torches or other lights.

title: Daze
description: Humanoid creature of 4 HD or less loses next action.

title: Detect Magic
description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

title: Flare
description: Dazzles one creature (–1 on attack rolls).

title: Ghost Sound
description: Figment sounds.

title: Haunted Fey Aspect
description: You surround yourself with disturbing illusions.

title: Know Direction
description: You discern north.

title: Light
description: Object shines like a torch.

title: Lullaby
description: Makes subject drowsy (–5 on Perception checks, –2 on Will saves against sleep.)

title: Mage Hand
description: 5-pound telekinesis.

title: Mending
description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

title: Message
description: Whisper conversation at distance.

title: Open/Close
description: Opens or closes small or light things.

title: Prestidigitation
description: Performs minor tricks.

title: Read Magic
description: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

title: Resistance
description: Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

title: Sift
description: See area as though examining it.

title: Spark
description: Ignites flammable objects.

title: Summon Instrument
description: Summons one musical instrument.

title: Unwitting Ally
description: Subject is considered ally for 1 round.

title: Abundant Ammunition
description: Replaces nonmagical ammunition every round.

title: Adjuring Step
description: You can move slowly and safely and still cast spells, until you move quickly, make an attack, or cast a harmful spell.

title: Adoration
description: You gain a bonus on Diplomacy checks and performance combat checks.

title: Alarm
description: Wards an area for 2 hours/level.

title: Animate Rope
description: Makes a rope move at your command.

title: Anticipate Peril
description: Target gains a bonus on one initiative check.

title: Beguiling Gift
description: Subject immediately accepts an offered item and uses it.

title: Borrow Skill
description: Make a skill check using another’s ranks.

title: Cause Fear
description: One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.

title: Charm Person
description: Makes one person your friend.

title: Chord of Shards
description: Performance deals 2d6 piercing damage.

title: Compel Hostility
description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

title: Comprehend Languages
description: You understand all languages.

title: Confusion, Lesser
description: One creature is confused for 1 round.

title: Cure Light Wounds
description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level (max +5).

title: Dancing Lantern
description: Animates a lantern that follows you.

title: Delusional Pride
description: Target is penalized on attacks and checks but gains bonus against charms and compulsions.

title: Detect Charm
description: Detect strength and location of charms, compulsions, and possession auras on creatures in the area.

title: Detect Secret Doors
description: Reveals hidden doors within 60 ft.

title: Disguise Self
description: Changes your appearance.

title: Ear-Piercing Scream
description: Deal sonic damage and daze target.

title: Erase
description: Mundane or magical writing vanishes.

title: Expeditious Retreat
description: Your base land speed increases by 30 ft.

title: Feather Fall
description: Objects or creatures fall slowly.

title: Feather Step
description: Ignore movement penalty in difficult terrain.

title: Flare Burst
description: As flare, but on all creatures within 10 ft.

title: Forced Quiet
description: Target cannot make loud noises.

title: Fumbletongue
description: Target cannot speak intelligently.

title: Grease
description: Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.

title: Hideous Laughter
description: Subject loses actions for 1 round/ level.

title: Horn of Pursuit
description: Create three notes heard miles away.

title: Hypnotism
description: Fascinates 2d4 HD of creatures.

title: Identify
description: Gives +10 bonus to identify magic items.

title: Innocence
description: Gain +10 on Bluff checks to seem innocent.

title: Invigorate
description: Temporarily relieves fatigue or exhaustion.

title: Jury-Rig
description: Removes the broken condition from the targeted object.

title: Ki Arrow
description: Arrow deals damage as your unarmed strike.

title: Liberating Command
description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

title: Lock Gaze
description: Compels the target to look only at you for the duration of the spell.

title: Moment of Greatness
description: Doubles a morale bonus.

title: Magic Mouth
description: Objects speaks once when triggered.

title: Memory Lapse
description: Subject forgets events back to last turn.

title: Magic Aura
description: Alters object's magic aura.

title: Negative Reaction
description: Targeted creature may not positively influence anyone.

title: Obscure Object
description: Masks object against scrying.

title: Play Instrument
description: Play instrument as if you were skilled.

title: Remove Fear
description: Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.

title: Restful Sleep
description: Gain more hit points while sleeping.

title: Saving Finale
description: Subject rerolls failed saving throw.

title: See Alignment
description: Pick an alignment; in your sight, creatures and items with that alignment emit a ghostly radiance.

title: Share Language
description: Subject understands chosen language.

title: Silent Image
description: Creates minor illusion of your design.

title: Sleep
description: Puts 4 HD of creatures into magical slumber.

title: Solid Note
description: Creates tangible music note.

title: Summon Minor Monster
description: Summon 1d3 Tiny animals.

title: Summon Monster I
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Swallow Your Fear
description: Grants +2 morale bonus to Str and Con, +1 morale bonus to Will saves, and -2 penalty to AC to subjects suffering from afear effect. Prevents frightened subject from running.

title: Tap Inner Beauty
description: You gain a +2 insight bonus on all Charisma ability checks and Charisma-based skill checks.

title: Timely Inspiration
description: Gives bonus on failed check/attack.

title: Touch of Gracelessness
description: Subject loses 1d6 + 1 Dex/two levels and is prone to falling down.

title: Unbreakable Heart
description: Target gains a +4 bonus on saves against mind-affecting effects that rely on negative emotions.

title: Undetectable Alignment
description: Conceals alignment for 24 hours.

title: Unnatural Lust
description: Target is compelled to kiss or caress another.

title: Unprepared Combatant
description: Target takes -4 on initiative and Reflex saves.

title: Unseen Servant
description: Invisible force obeys your commands.

title: Vanish
description: As invisibility for 1 round/level (5 max).

title: Ventriloquism
description: Throws voice for 1 min./level.

title: Vocal Alteration
description: Disguise target's voice.

title: Youthful Appearance
description: Target appears younger.

title: Acute Senses
description: Subject gains bonus on Perception checks.

title: Allegro
description: Gain haste while maintaining bardic performance.

title: Alter Self
description: Assume form of a Small or Medium humanoid.

title: Ancestral Communion
description: You contact your ancestors to bolster your own knowledge.

title: Animal Messenger
description: Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.

title: Animal Trance
description: Fascinates 2d6 HD of animals.

title: Blindness/Deafness
description: Makes subject blind or deaf.

title: Blistering Invective
description: Make an Intimidate check against all foes within 30 feet; those demoralized also take fire damage.

title: Blood Biography
description: Learn about a creature with its blood.

title: Boiling Blood
description: Targets take fire damage; orcs get +2 Strength.

title: Book Ward
description: As protection from energy, except lasting 1 day/level instead of 10 minutes per level and that the spell only protects against acid and fire damage (and while energy protection remains, the item is also completely waterproof).

title: Blur
description: Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.

title: Cacophonous Call
description: Nauseates target.

title: Calm Emotions
description: Calms creatures, negating emotion effects.

title: Cat's Grace
description: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.

title: Codespeak
description: Grant all recipients ability to speak, read and write a new secret language.

title: Compassionate Ally
description: Target compelled to help injured ally.

title: Create Treasure Map
description: Creates a treasure map out of a creature's corpse.

title: Cure Moderate Wounds
description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).

title: Darkness
description: 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.

title: Daze Monster
description: Living creature of 6 HD or less loses next action.

title: Delay Pain
description: Ignore pain for 1 hour/level.

title: Delay Poison
description: Stops poison from harming target for 1 hour/level.

title: Detect Thoughts
description: Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

title: Discovery Torch
description: Touched object emanates bright light, granting Perception and Sense Motive bonuses.

title: Disguise Other
description: As disguise self, but affects you or another.

title: Distracting Cacophony
description: Noise makes it difficult to cast.

title: Distressing Tone
description: Sound sickens 1d4 creatures.

title: Dust of Twilight
description: Black particles extinguish light sources.

title: Eagle's Splendor
description: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

title: Enter Image
description: Transfers your consciousness to an object bearing your likeness.

title: Enthrall
description: Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

title: Fox's Cunning
description: Subject gains +4 to Int for 1 min./level.

title: Gallant Inspiration
description: #ERROR!

title: Ghostbane Dirge
description: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from non-magical weapons.

title: Ghostly Disguise
description: You look like a ghost of yourself.

title: Glitterdust
description: Blinds creatures, outlines invisible creatures.

title: Haunting Mists
description: Creatures are shaken and take Wis damage.

title: Heroic Fortune
description: The target gains 1 temporary hero point.

title: Heroism
description: Gives +2 on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.

title: Hidden Speech
description: Gain +10 on Bluff to send secret messages.

title: Hold Person
description: Paralyzes one humanoid for 1 round/level.

title: Honeyed Tongue
description: Roll 2 dice when using Diplomacy, take higher roll.

title: Hypnotic Pattern
description: Fascinates (2d4 + level) HD of creatures.

title: Invisibility
description: Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.

title: Locate Object
description: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

title: Mad Hallucination
description: Target takes penalties to mental actions.

title: Masterwork Transformation
description: Make a normal item into a masterwork one.

title: Minor Image
description: As silent image, plus some sound.

title: Mirror Image
description: Creates decoy duplicates of you (1d4 + 1 per three levels, max 8).

title: Misdirection
description: Misleads divinations for one creature or object.

title: Miserable Pity
description: Opponents cannot attack a pathetic creature.

title: Oppressive Boredom
description: Target loses its next action.

title: Piercing Shriek
description: Target is staggered by a painful sound.

title: Pilfering Hand
description: You may seize an object or manipulate it from afar.

title: Pyrotechnics
description: Turns fire into blinding light or choking smoke.

title: Qualm
description: Target gains penalties on ability checks, skill checks, and concentration checks until it spends an entire round doing nothing.

title: Rage
description: Gives +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.

title: Reckless Infatuation
description: Target is compelled to stay near another.

title: Retrieve Item
description: Call an item instantly to you hand from nearby by speaking a special word and snapping your fingers. The spell fails if the item is in the possession of another creature.

title: Returning Weapon
description: Grants a weapon the returning special weapon quality.

title: Scare
description: Panicks creatures of less than 6 HD.

title: Share Language, Communal
description: As share language, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Share Memory
description: Share one memory with the target.

title: Shatter
description: Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.

title: Silence
description: Negates sound in 20-ft. radius.

title: Silk to Steel
description: Use a scarf as a shield or whip.

title: Snapdragon Fireworks
description: Create 1 dragon firework/level.

title: Sound Burst
description: Deals 1d8 sonic damage and may stun subjects.

title: Steal Voice
description: Target gains the croaking spellblight.

title: Suggestion
description: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

title: Summon Monster II
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Summon Swarm
description: Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.

title: Tactical Acumen
description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.

title: Thunder Fire
description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm deafens opponents.

title: Tongues
description: Speak and understand any language.

title: Unadulterated Loathing
description: Target is compelled to avoid another creature.

title: Versatile Weapon
description: Weapon bypasses some DR.

title: Wartrain Mount
description: Animal gains the combat training general purpose.

title: Whispering Wind
description: Sends a short message 1 mile/level.

title: Arcane Concordance
description: Grants metamagic to arcane spells.

title: Aura of the Unremarkable
description: An invisible sphere of magic surrounds you, clouding the minds of creatures in the area so they regard even the strangest actions as innocuous.

title: Blink
description: You randomly vanish and reappear for 1 round/level.

title: Campfire Wall
description: Creates a shelter around a campfire.

title: Channel the Gift
description: Channel magical power into target to fuel their spellcasting. The next 3rd level or lower spell target casts does not expend a spell slot; instead you use your spell slot to power their spell.

title: Charm Monster
description: Makes monster believe it is your ally.

title: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
description: Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

title: Confusion
description: Subjects behave oddly for 1 round/level.

title: Control Summoned Creature
description: Direct a summoned monster as if you had summoned it.

title: Coordinated Effort
description: Grants a teamwork feat you have.

title: Crushing Despair
description: Subjects take –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

title: Cure Serious Wounds
description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

title: Curse of Disgust
description: Target is sickened when viewing a trigger.

title: Daylight
description: 60-ft. radius of bright light.

title: Delay Poison, Communal
description: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Deep Slumber
description: Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.

title: Dispel Magic
description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.

title: Displacement
description: Attacks miss subject 50% of the time.

title: Elemental Speech
description: Enables you to speak to elementals and some creatures.

title: Exquisite Accompaniment
description: Instrument maintains bardic performance for you.

title: Fear
description: Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

title: Feather Step, Mass
description: As feather step, but multiple creatures.

title: Gaseous Form
description: Subject becomes insubstantial and can fly slowly.

title: Geas, Lesser
description: Commands subject of 7 HD or less.

title: Glibness
description: You gain +20 bonus on Bluff checks, and your lies can escape magical discernment.

title: Good Hope
description: Subjects gain +2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

title: Harrowing
description: You use a Harrow deck to tell a fortune for yourself or someone else.

title: Haste
description: One creature/level moves faster, receives +1 on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves.

title: Haunting Choir
description: Spirits cause wracking pain to listeners.

title: Illusory Script
description: Only select creatures can read text.

title: Invigorate, Mass
description: As invigorate, but multiple creatures.

title: Invisibility Sphere
description: Makes everyone within 10 feet invisible.

title: Jester's Jaunt
description: Teleport target within 30 ft. of itself.

title: Lover's Vengeance
description: You inspire yourself or a lover to a vengeful rage against a chosen enemy.

title: Mad Monkeys
description: Summon a swarm of mischievous monkeys.

title: Major Image
description: As silent image, plus sound, smell, and thermal effects.

title: Malicious Spite
description: Target is compelled to plot against another.

title: Overwhelming Grief
description: Grieving target can take no actions and is denied its Dex bonus.

title: Phantom Driver
description: Conjures a phantom to drive vehicles.

title: Phantom Steed
description: Magic horse appears for 1 hour/level.

title: Purging Finale
description: Removes one negative effect.

title: Rain of Frogs
description: Summon a swarm of poisonous frogs.

title: Remove Curse
description: Frees object or person from curse.

title: Returning weapon, Communal
description: As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.

title: Reviving Finale
description: Allies cured 2d6 damage.

title: Scrying
description: Spies on subject from a distance.

title: Sculpt Sound
description: Creates new sounds or changes existing ones into new sounds.

title: Secret Page
description: Changes one page to hide its real content.

title: See Invisibility
description: Reveals invisible creatures or objects.

title: Seek Thoughts
description: Detects thinking creatures’ thoughts.

title: Sepia Snake Sigil
description: Creates a snake-shaped text symbol that immobilizes reader.

title: Slow
description: One subject/level takes only one action/round, –1 to AC, Reflex saves, and attack rolls.

title: Smug Narcissism
description: Target is distracted by its sense of self.

title: Speak with Animals
description: You can communicate with animals.

title: Summon Monster III
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Terrible Remorse
description: Creature is compelled to harm itself.

title: Thunderous Drums
description: 1d8 damage/level and knocked prone.

title: Tiny Hut
description: Creates shelter for 10 creatures.

title: Tongues, Communal
description: As tongues, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Vision of Hell
description: Illusory hellscape makes creatures shaken.

title: Witness
description: See through the target's eyes and ears.

title: Ancestral Gift
description: A ghostly ancestor appears and gives you a magic weapon, which you may use as if you were proficient in it.

title: Apparent Master
description: Charm makes a construct regard you as its master.

title: Break Enchantment
description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

title: Cure Critical Wounds
description: Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).

title: Dance of a Hundred Cuts
description: Gain +1 combat bonus/3 levels.

title: Daze, Mass
description: As daze, but affecting multiple creatures.

title: Denounce
description: Worsens attitudes toward target creature.

title: Detect Scrying
description: Alerts you to magical eavesdropping.

title: Dimension Door
description: Teleports you a short distance.

title: Discordant Blast
description: 3d6 sonic damage in 10-ft. burst or 30-ft. cone can also bull rush creatures.

title: Dominate Person
description: Controls humanoid telepathically.

title: Echolocation
description: Sonic sense gives you blindsight 40 ft.

title: Envious Urge
description: Targets steal from or disarm others.

title: Ghostbane Dirge, Mass
description: As ghostbane dirge, but affecting multiple creatures.

title: Freedom of Movement
description: Subject moves normally despite impediments to restrict movement.

title: Hallucinatory Terrain
description: Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field as forest, or the like).

title: Heroic Finale
description: Subject within range of your bardic performance can take an action.

title: Heroic Fortune, Mass
description: As heroic fortune, except it affects more targets.

title: Hold Monster
description: As hold person, but any creature.

title: Invisibility, Greater
description: As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.

title: Legend Lore
description: Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

title: Locate Creature
description: Indicates direction to known creature.

title: Modify Memory
description: Changes 5 minutes of subject's memories.

title: Neutralize Poison
description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

title: Phantom Steed, Communal
description: As phantom steed, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Primal Scream
description: Free yourself from enchantments and paralysis effects.

title: Rainbow Pattern
description: Lights fascinate 24 HD of creatures.

title: Repel Vermin
description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

title: Secure Shelter
description: Creates sturdy cottage.

title: Serenity
description: Peaceful feelings harm those attempting violence.

title: Shadow Conjuration
description: Mimics conjuration below 4th level, but only 20% real.

title: Shadow Step
description: Teleport from one shadow to another.

title: Shield of the Dawnflower
description: Creatures that strike you take 1d6 +1/level fire damage.

title: Shocking Image
description: As mirror image, but the duplicates emit electrical damage when destroyed.

title: Shout
description: Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.

title: Sonic Thrust
description: Sound moves targets away from you.

title: Speak with Plants
description: You can talk to plants and plant creatures.

title: Summon Accuser
description: Summons a single accuser devil from Hell to do your bidding.

title: Summon Monster IV
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Treasure Stitching
description: Objects on cloth become embroidered.

title: Utter Contempt
description: target's attitude worsens by two categories.

title: Virtuoso Performance
description: Start a second bardic performance while maintaining the first.

title: Wall of Sound
description: Sonic wall deflects and damages creatures.

title: Wandering Star Motes
description: Outlines subject, produces light.

title: Zone of Silence
description: Keeps eavesdroppers from overhearing you.

title: Bard's Escape
description: You and allies escape an emergency by teleporting to safety.

title: Cacophonous Call, Mass
description: Nauseates multiple targets.

title: Cloak of Dreams
description: Living creatures within 5 ft. fall asleep.

title: Covetous Aura
description: You may gain the benefits of a spell meant for someone else.

title: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Deafening Song Bolt
description: Blast of song deals 3d10 damage and deafens targets.

title: Dispel Magic, Greater
description: As dispel magic, but can affect multiple targets.

title: Dream
description: Sends message to anyone sleeping.

title: False Vision
description: Fools scrying with an illusion.

title: Foe to Friend
description: Redirect an enemy creature's attack.

title: Frozen Note
description: Paralyzes creatures listening to your song.

title: Heroism, Greater
description: Gives +4 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks; immunity to fear; temporary hp.

title: Joyful Rapture
description: Negate harmful emotions.

title: Ki Shout
description: Target takes 1d6 sonic/level and is stunned.

title: Mind Fog
description: Subjects in fog get –10 to Wis and Will checks.

title: Mirage Arcana
description: As hallucinatory terrain, plus structures.

title: Mislead
description: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

title: Nightmare
description: Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.

title: Persistent Image
description: As major image, but no concentration required.

title: Phantasmal Web
description: Catches subjects in illusory web.

title: Resonating Word
description: Target is damaged, staggered, and stunned.

title: Seeming
description: Changes appearance of one person per two levels.

title: Shadow Evocation
description: Mimics evocation of lower than 5th level, but only 20% real.

title: Shadow Walk
description: Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

title: Shadowbard
description: Shadowy duplicate starts a bardic performance.

title: Song of Discord
description: Forces targets to attack each other.

title: Stunning Finale
description: Stuns 3 creatures for 1 round.

title: Suggestion, Mass
description: As suggestion, affects subject/level.

title: Summon Infernal Host
description: Summon host devils.

title: Summon Monster V
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Unwilling Shield
description: Subject shares wounds you receive.

title: Vengeful Outrage
description: Target is compelled to destroy one enemy.

title: Analyze Dweomer
description: Reveals magical aspects of subject.

title: Animate Objects
description: Objects attack your foes.

title: Brilliant Inspiration
description: Take best of two d20 rolls.

title: Cat's Grace, Mass
description: As cat's grace, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Charm Monster, Mass
description: As charm monster, but all within 30 ft.

title: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Dance of a Thousand Cuts
description: As dance of a hundred cuts, plus the benefits of haste.

title: Deadly Finale
description: Deals 2d8 damage to multiple targets.

title: Dirge of the Victorious Knights
description: Call forth special illusions of mounted Hellknights.

title: Eagle's Splendor, Mass
description: As eagle's splendor, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Euphoric Tranquility
description: Makes a single creature peaceful and friendly.

title: Eyebite
description: Target becomes panicked, sickened, and/or comatose.

title: Find the Path
description: Shows most direct way to a location.

title: Fool's Forbiddance
description: Confuses enemies who come within a magical emanation centered on you.

title: Fox's Cunning, Mass
description: As fox's cunning, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Geas/Quest
description: As lesser geas, but affects any creature.

title: Getaway
description: Teleports a group of predetermined allies and creatures to a predetermined location.

title: Heroes' Feast
description: Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

title: Irresistible Dance
description: Forces subject to dance.

title: Overwhelming Presence
description: Creatures bow before you as if you were divine.

title: Permanent Image
description: Permanent illusion, includes sight, sound, smell, and thermal effects.

title: Pied Piping
description: Compel similar creatures to follow you.

title: Programmed Image
description: As major image, plus triggered by event.

title: Project Image
description: Illusory double can talk and cast spells.

title: Scrying, Greater
description: As scrying, but faster and longer.

title: Shout, Greater
description: Devastating yell deals 10d6 sonic damage; stuns creatures.

title: Summon Monster VI
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Sympathetic Vibration
description: Deals 2d10 damage/round to freestanding structure.

title: Veil
description: Changes appearance of group of creatures.

title: Waves of Ecstasy
description: Pleasure stuns and staggers creatures.
